message: TRUE_FALSE_TABLE questions not displaying in Practice mode; MULTIPLE_CHOICE result colors not rendering after check
root_cause: (1) PracticeScreen rendered inline options without QuestionView component, missing TRUE_FALSE_TABLE support. (2) QuestionView used ternary operator for styling that caused TailwindMerge to override green/red result classes with white background.
fix_applied: Refactored PracticeScreen to use QuestionView component with multi-select toggle, deferred check button, and exact-match evaluation. Rewrote QuestionView styling with explicit if/else logic. Added correct answer summary section.
